description: The Red Lodge Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Red Lodge for the snow report
Alexa, ask Red Lodge for latest conditions

name: Snow Report for Red Lodge
shortDescription: The Red Lodge Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Red Lodge.
